intro: Spiesia densa, commonly known as the dense spurge, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It is characterized by its succulent, fleshy leaves and clusters of yellow flowers. The plant belongs to the family Euphorbiaceae, which includes many species with milky sap. Spiesia densa typically grows in rocky or sandy soils and is often found in coastal areas. It is adapted to dry conditions and can thrive in full sun.
